meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shaped like a box.
meanings.sent1: The boxiness of the building made it stand out among the round structures.
meanings.sent2: The boxiness of the package made it easy to stack with other boxes.
meanings.sent3: The boxiness of the cake made it look like a delicious square treat.
meanings.sent4: The boxiness of the room created a sense of confinement and order.
meanings.sent5: The boxiness of the car trunk allowed for efficient storage of items.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a square or rectangular shape.
meanings.sent1: The boxiness of the table made it fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The boxiness of the TV screen made it ideal for watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The boxiness of the gift box made it easy to wrap with paper.
meanings.sent4: The boxiness of the bookshelf added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The boxiness of the phone case provided great protection for the device.
